name: Colorful Contemplation
desc:
Inspiration for graffiti that, following Dopey Dazzler's suggestion, you've gathered from various sightseeing spots across Natlan. When you calm your mind and focus on the act of observing things, you find that you are able to glean a more thorough understanding of their shapes and colors, which proves greatly beneficial when creating graffiti...
Can be used to unlock all sorts of material rewards during the "Traces of Artistry" event.

customize.name: Ash-Graven Drinking Horn
customize.desc: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero "Giant" Tupac.

customize.name: Colorful Contemplation
customize.desc:

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: "The Sea's Silent Shade"
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for the "Ash-Graven Drinking Horn."
The fine and warm colored sand has a texture as gentle as the sea breeze at sunset.
According to an ancient Meztli legend, the sea is the stars' home, and the sinking starlight will eventually turn into pale ocean sand. Listen quietly, then, to the swaying whispers of the stars and the tides within the bottle.

customize.name: Philosophies of Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Its purpose is to make yourself stronger. After the outcome of a competition has been decided, the victor gains the confidence to be sure of their direction, while the loser gains insights on how they must become stronger. Beyond winning or losing, this is the true meaning of contention.

customize.name: Philosophies of Kindling
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Offering up kindling is the established rule of the Nation of Pyro.
What is meant by offering kindling is to offer up a sacrifice before one obtains something, though it does not always guarantee a response or return. Its true meaning lies in paying a price without expecting a reward â€” for in the end, the day when the fruits will be reaped is sure to come.

customize.name: Philosophies of Conflict
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Conflict is considered reason in the Nation of Pyro.
The premise of conflict is that all parties involved must confront their own desires with the utmost sincerity. Only then, amid the fight or debate, can they remain mindful of what they wish to achieve and stay true to their original objectives.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.
